string-array.name: get_all_groups
string-array.item: Returns all of the groups in your tenant\'s directory.

string-array.name: insert_a_group
string-array.item: Adds a new security group to the tenant.

string-array.name: get_a_group
string-array.item: GET: get a group by id
Gets information about a specific group in the tenant by ID.

string-array.name: update_a_group
string-array.item: PATCH: update the description of a group
Creates a new group in the tenant and then updates the description of that group.

string-array.name: delete_a_group
string-array.item: Creates a new group in the tenant and then deletes that group.
